day1.title: Morning – Vision & Content
day1.description: Opening keynotes and content-focused sessions setting the vision for Web3 & AI.

day1.title: Midday – Interaction & Networking
day1.description: Structured networking sessions, Q&A opportunities, and direct access to speakers.

day1.title: Afternoon – Builders & Startups
day1.description: Builder-focused sessions for practitioners, founders, and operators shaping Web3 & AI ecosystems.

day1.title: Evening – Community & Connections
day1.description: Community building, long-term connections, and meaningful relationships over short-term exposure.
